extendedInfo.description: The Sasol e.Birds of Southern Africa is an interactive version of the best-selling Sasol Birds of Southern Africa field guide. This application has specific features that will enhance your birding experience.NB: Please note that an additional download of 185MB is required once this app has been installed. Please ensure you use a WiFi connection to prevent additional data costs.FEATURES:- Images, distribution maps and text descriptions of over 950 bird species found in the Southern African region.- Audible calls for over 630 bird species- A "Smart Search" that allows you to easily identify a bird using beak shape, bird size, bird colour and habitat.- You can select a region of Southern Africa, so that the lists of birds throughout the program display only the birds in your region. Includes GPS detection of your current location.- "Bird Compare" to allow you to compare two birds on the same screen (including calls).- A personal bird list that stores your bird sightings saved to the device* and can be exported to your storage card, email or to ebird.org extended record format.- GPS location tagging of bird sightings.- View the Bird Index by English or Afrikaans bird names.* Uninstalling/reinstalling the program will result in the loss of your list, it is recommended that you keep a backup from the application (My List -> Export).We invite all users to share their comments and ideas on our forum at www.mydigitalearth.com

reviews.title: Good but can be better
reviews.comment: Very good app, but when you put language to afrikaans it only give the name in afrikaans not the description.
reviews.author: Franco Furstenberg

reviews.title: Bird call error
reviews.comment: Love the app. The bird call for southern boubou is wrong. Don\'t know how many others are affected. Please check and fix.
reviews.author: Jaco Heyl

reviews.title: Search makes a great improvement
reviews.comment: New search option is agreat improvement Now i can use it
reviews.author: Jan de Wet

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Deserves 5 stars for the smart search function. A very complete and useful app for bird watchers and enthusiasts alike.
reviews.author: Degert Botha

reviews.title: Paper book is better...
reviews.comment: If I have the paper book available, I use that first. The smart search is all but useless. The export function on an older version worked, so I exported my lists. I then bought a new tablet and phone, tried to import my lists, the software says it can\'t import - now I have to manually input all my lists again. Funny enough, it doesn\'t export anymore either. Support staff are as useless as the software. Very expensive purchase, and would have been better off buying second book to keep in my car.6 Update: just got worse since the latest update. Now it crashes so often that it has become completely useless. All the new features the developers are boasting about are un-useable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: Just updated to the latest version of this, already, super app. This is such a user-friendly and comprehensive app. You guys rock !!
reviews.author: Robbie Knezovich

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: This app has come a long way since its initial launch. It is obviously a large app that uses a lot of ram because of the amount of information available. I mean, for each bird there are maps, information, sounds, pictures and more! So obviously that means the newer and more up to date your phone and software...the better the app should function! Worth every penny!!!
reviews.author: Joshua Kruger

reviews.title: Very good, not perfect
reviews.comment: Only had the app a few days. Great, as now my bird reference is always with me. I feel it is relatively expensive, and a few glitches. As mentioned by others, full bird name obscured in main bird page. Just found Yellow Billed Kite missing when in Location E Cape, though distribution map shows otherwise. It is summer now, and Kite listed as summer visitor.
reviews.author: Les Woods

reviews.title: sasol eBirds smart search
reviews.comment: Everytime I do a smart search the app stops working.  WHat a dissapointment.  It was realy a pricy app but I dont think it is all that great and definately not worth the money!
reviews.author: Arlene Ries

reviews.title: Ddb
reviews.comment: Nice improvements,  but still has a frustrating and poor search function that requires exact spelling:-) and no contextual promps,  likevthe black berry search for example, dont understand why andoid seems so clunky on this critical function. Try search for tern and it comes up with herons. ?
reviews.author: Derek Berliner

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1. Can I download on phone as well without paying for app again?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Always improving.
reviews.comment: This has become a handy app while in field. Does need to have a broader location selection. Considering Larks, just selecting \'Western Cape\'  is open to omissions in the list. Slowly evolving from assistance while birding to a reference tool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising...
reviews.comment: Lists, sketches and sounds are good.   Smart search don\'t work most of the time - sometimes freezes app.  Requires afrikaans descriptions. When in Afr mode it does not show Eng names.  Some Afr words has spelling errors. Requires urgent bug fixes for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Willie Gouws

reviews.title: Afrikaans bug
reviews.comment: Great app, but it has one major bug. If you set the language to afrikaans and do a smart search, the app crashes. Please fix this!
reviews.author: Estie Groenewald

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: With my new app I have downloaded everytime I do a smart search the app stops working. Why is this? How can it be fixed?  My older app did a good search eveytime. Other than that it is a great app.
reviews.author: Piet Venter

reviews.title: My list
reviews.comment: After update my list was wiped out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice to have gallery view. Would be nice to see entire bird name on bird screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOST DATA
reviews.comment: WITH THE LAST UPDATE I HAVE    (I THINK THIS IS WHEN)    LOST ALL MY DATA;   \"YOU HAVE NO LISTS\" IS THE MESSAGE.  NOT IMPRESSED. I WILL WAIT FOR MY RATING, PRESENTLY IT IS SOMEWHAT AVERAGE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sasol ebirds
reviews.comment: Excellent and easy to use.
reviews.author: Anriette Esterhuysen

reviews.title: Jan Botha
reviews.comment: App stops working when \"smart search\" is used. Makes the app close to useless.
reviews.author: Jan Botha
